name: Juicy Cut
description:
Gameplay is Super-Simple
--------------------------------------
Press to Peel & Avoid Obstacles!
--------------------------------------

Tap and hold to peel the fruit
Send it to the blender
Make delicious fruit juice!
Take control of the knife and start juicing!
Challenge yourself to make endless fruit juice!

Juicing has never been more fun! The blender is ready. What about you?!
